verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The curse is rolled away
The grave has lost her prey
Dost see that noble throng
Singing a triumph song
Dost hear the words they sing
'O death where is thy sting'
Where grave thy victory
Where grave thy victory'

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The saints in glad array
Are praising God always
For death has been destroyeed
'Tis rendered null and void
With joyful voice they sing
'O death where is thy sting
Where grave thy victory
Where grave thy victory'

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O marvellous display
Of Life's reality
That it could swallow up
Death's dark and bitter cup
Dost hear the whole Church sing
'O death where is thy sting
Where grave thy victory
Where grave thy victory'
